articles.title: Barty defends Miami Open title with win over injured Andreescu - WTA Tennis
articles.description: World No.1 Ashleigh Barty becomes the sixth woman to defend a Miami Open title after a second-set retirement from an injured Bianca Andreescu.
articles.content: The woman at the top of the WTA rankings finished on top at the Miami Open. Ashleigh Barty defeated an injured No.8 seed Bianca Andreescu 6-3, 4-0, ret. on Saturday to successfully defend her title.… [+4355 chars]

articles.title: Roosters v Warriors: Radley returns; club debut for Montoya - NRL.COM
articles.description: Roosters v Warriors: The wounded Roosters certainly have a job on their hands to quell the high-spirited Warriors, who turned a 19-point deficit into a three-point win over the Raiders last week.
